name: slimly

slimly adverb
(THIN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
approving in an attractively thin way: slimly built He was a tall, black-haired man, slimly built except for wide shoulders. There was a slimly elegant bridge to take pedestrians from the car park to the shopping centre.
More examplesFewer examplesThe legs of the trousers were slimly cut.She turned to me, her slimly elegant hand outstretched.It is an attractive, slimly shaped tree with pink flowers on the branches.
